segments.text: I didn ’ t receive an unemployment check this week and need to know why .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you mail us your last Continued Claim Form ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am afraid that I forgot to send it in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We cannot pay you unless you turn that form in every two weeks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is it too late to mail the Continued Claim Form in now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It can ’ t be more than fourteen days late for us to accept it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will mail it in a little early next time to avoid this problem .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can ’ t possibly know in advance how much you will be working . If you mail it in too soon , we will reject it !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will my paycheck arrive late because I messed up on my form ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your check will be arriving late , but the next one will come right on time .
segments.speaker: S2
